title: {Godprop #12} Apocalypse Insurance
body:
If this proposal passes:

The DAO will not allow the addition of USDC and USDT pools, nor liquidity pair pools, nor n-pool lp pools (see curve/balancer) containing either asset, nor pools for vault deposit tokens of any of the prior, to any aspect of any project produced by the DAO. 

The DAO will not hold any assets that are forbidden for addition to the ecosystem in the prior sentence.

The DAO will handle these allowed stablecoins accordingly:
1. DAI - Deposited into Cream.
2. MIM - 50% Sold for FTM and deposited to into Spirit FTM-MIM LP. Deposited into mlnl.finance.
3. fUSD - Converted to iFUSD on Stakesteak.com, paired with Steak when possible and used to farm Steak.
author: 0x8DE3c3891268502F77DB7E876d727257DEc0F852
